snippet: Under pressure to reduce sodium and saturated fats in American diets, the cheese industry has tried, with little success, to make products with less salt or fat that consumers will like.
abstract: American cheese industry, under pressure to reduce the consumption of sodium and saturated fats, has had little success in producing healthier products that consumers will still enjoy (Series: What We Eat).
lead_paragraph: Under pressure to reduce sodium and saturated fats in American diets, the cheese industry has tried, with little success, to make products with less salt or fat that consumers will like.

headline.seo: U.S. Cheese Industry Works to Reduce Sodium and Fat
headline.main: Asked to Get Slim, Cheese Resists
headline.print_headline: Asked To Get Slim, Cheese Resists
